info.title: Zilyo
info.description: This API gives you access from over 2,500,000 Vacation Rental and Short term rentals listings across the world in over 200,000 destinations. We return results for short term rentals ranging from apartments, houses, cottages, villas, castles, and even igloos, from all over the world. We currently support these 23 suppliers: Airbnb, HomeAway, AlwaysOnVacation, ApartmentsApart, BookingPal, BedyCasa, CitiesReference, Geronimo, Gloveler, HolidayVelvet, HomeStay, HostelWorld, HouseTrip, Interhome, 9Flats, Roomorama, StopSleepGo, TheOtherHome, Travelmob, VacationRentalPeople, VaycayHero, WayToStay, and WebChalet.

get.description: Performs a search query to find listings based on your parameters. Using neLatitude, neLongitude, swLatitude, swLongitude as required parameters. Supports all filtering parameters.

parameters.name: isinstantbook
parameters.description: Show listings that can only be instantly booked

parameters.name: nelatitude
parameters.description: North East Latitude for a box search

parameters.name: nelongitude
parameters.description: North East Longitude for a box search

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: Comma separated values of namespaced providers. See overview/provider for the list

parameters.name: swlatitude
parameters.description: South west Latitude for a box search

parameters.name: swlongitude
parameters.description: South west Longitude for a box search

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma separated values of ids

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback function name

parameters.name: etimestamp
parameters.description: The check out unix timestamp

parameters.name: guests
parameters.description: The minimum number of guests a listing can occupy

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude is optional. If it's not provided it will fallback to using a box query

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude is optional. If it's not provided it will fallback to using a box query

parameters.name: maxdistance
parameters.description: Radius from a center point in Km. Value from 0.01 to 200

parameters.name: numofbathrooms
parameters.description: The minimum number of bedrooms a listing can have

parameters.name: numofbedrooms
parameters.description: The minimum number of bedrooms a listing can have

parameters.name: numofbeds
parameters.description: The minimum number of beds a listing can have

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number

parameters.name: pricemax
parameters.description: The maximum price a listing can have in USD (nightly)

parameters.name: pricemin
parameters.description: The minimum price a listing can have in USD (nightly)

parameters.name: resultsperpage
parameters.description: The number of results per page. Value from 1 to 50

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sort method

parameters.name: stimestamp
parameters.description: The check in unix timestamp

get.description: Returns the number of results for a search query. Accepts all parameters from /search. Supports all filtering parameters.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude

get.description: Performs a single ID search. The fastest and most efficient way if you want to query only 1 id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The listing id
